tasks.all: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check && deno task readme && deno task test
tasks.all-reload: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check --reload && deno task test --reload
tasks.check: sh -c '$(command -v fd || command -v fdfind) '"'"'\.(mj|j|t)sx?$'"'"' --hidden --exec deno check {}'
tasks.readme: touch README.md && chmod +w README.md && ./readme/generate-readme.ts readme/README.md https://deno.land/x/websocket_broadcastchannel > README.md && deno fmt README.md && chmod -w README.md
tasks.readme-html: deno task readme && sh -c 'docker run --rm -i hugojosefson/markdown <README.md >README.html'
tasks.release: deno task all && test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" && GITHUB_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) deno run --allow-env=GITHUB_TOKEN --allow-net=api.github.com --allow-run=bash https://deno.land/x/shipit@0.6.1/shipit.ts
tasks.udd: sh -c 'deno run --allow-read=. --allow-write=. --allow-net --allow-run=deno https://deno.land/x/udd@0.8.2/main.ts --test "deno task all" $($(command -v fd || command -v fdfind) '"'"'(\.(mj|j|t)sx?|^deno.jsonc?)$'"'"')'
